title: The Pirate
description: A hard wind. Salt on his tongue. The endless night. Those are the things Poseidon wants to find as he climbs to the deck. He doesn't expect to see a dehydrated young woman clinging to a red-and-white buoy.He rescues her, but he's no savior. She's an heiress. Valuable if he holds her for ransom. And why wouldn't he? He's hunted treasure all his life.Except once he's had a taste of her, he's not sure he can give her up.A modern-day pirate with a dark past.A fierce young woman with secrets of her own.And the adventure of a lifetime.The Pirate is the complete Devil trilogy in one volume.
author: Amelia Wilde
